results.text_hl: CASE REPORT: We describe the use of veno-venous extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (VV ECMO) in a previously healthy man following combined @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Overdose</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D062787 @@@overdose@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ in a suicide attempt.

results.title: Lipid emulsion use precluding renal replacement therapy.
results.text_hl: CASE REPORT: A 26-year-old @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@, male, kidney transplant recipient presented to an outside emergency department (ED) after an intentional @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Overdose</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D062787 @@@overdose@@@ of his medications (ie, @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@).
